mapper.sql: id, order_number, customer_id, phone_staff_id, receiver_staff_id, status, order_type, pay_type, pay_price, actual_price, finance_flag, finance_type, finance_operator_id, finance_date, warehouse_flag, warehouse_operator_id, warehouse_date, culture_flag, culture_operator_id, culture_date, create_date, create_id, update_date, update_id, delete_flag
mapper.select:
select (select e.`name` from employee_info e where e.id = phone_staff_id) as phone_staff_name, (select e.`name` from employee_info e where e.id = receiver_staff_id) as receiver_staff_name,
from order_info
and order_type in
order by ${orderByClause}

select sum(o.actual_price) as total_amounts, (select sum(o.actual_price) from order_info o left join customer_info c on o.customer_id = c.id
and c.area = '1' and o.status = '4' or o.pay_type = '1') as dl_amounts, (select sum(o.actual_price) from order_info o left join customer_info c on o.customer_id = c.id
and c.area = '0' and o.status = '4' or o.pay_type = '1') as sy_amounts from order_info o left join customer_info c on o.customer_id = c.id
and o.status = '4' or o.pay_type = '1'

select distinct (select DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +0 day)) as Monday_Day, (select sum(o.actual_price) from order_info o left join customer_info c on o.customer_id = c.id where o.create_date like CONCAT("%", DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +0 day), "%") and c.area = #{area} and o.status = '4' or o.pay_type = '1') as Monday, (select DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +1 day)) as Tuesday_Day, (select sum(o.actual_price) from order_info o left join customer_info c on o.customer_id = c.id where o.create_date like CONCAT("%", DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +1 day), "%") and c.area = #{area} and o.status = '4' or o.pay_type = '1') as Tuesday, (select DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +2 day)) as Wednesday_Day, (select sum(o.actual_price) from order_info o left join customer_info c on o.customer_id = c.id where o.create_date like CONCAT("%", DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +2 day), "%") and c.area = #{area} and o.status = '4' or o.pay_type = '1') as Wednesday, (select DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +3 day)) as Thursday_Day, (select sum(o.actual_price) from order_info o left join customer_info c on o.customer_id = c.id where o.create_date like CONCAT("%", DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +3 day), "%") and c.area = #{area} and o.status = '4' or o.pay_type = '1') as Thursday, (select DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +4 day)) as Friday_Day, (select sum(o.actual_price) from order_info o left join customer_info c on o.customer_id = c.id where o.create_date like CONCAT("%", DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +4 day), "%") and c.area = #{area} and o.status = '4' or o.pay_type = '1') as Friday, (select DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +5 day)) as Saturday_Day, (select sum(o.actual_price) from order_info o left join customer_info c on o.customer_id = c.id where o.create_date like CONCAT("%", DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +5 day), "%") and c.area = #{area} and o.status = '4' or o.pay_type = '1') as Saturday, (select DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +6 day)) as Sunday_Day, (select sum(o.actual_price) from order_info o left join customer_info c on o.customer_id = c.id where o.create_date like CONCAT("%", DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL +6 day), "%") and c.area = #{area} and o.status = '4' or o.pay_type = '1') as Sunday from order_info

select a.staff_id, a.staff_name, a.performance from ( select e.id as staff_id, e.`name` as staff_name, sum(o.actual_price) as performance from employee_info e left join order_info o on e.id = ${condition.conditionId} left join customer_info c on o.customer_id = c.id
and o.status = '4' or o.pay_type = '1' group by e.`name`
UNION
select e.id as staff_id, e.`name` as staff_name, 0 as performance from employee_info e where 1=1
and e.organization_id = #{condition.area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and e.position_type = #{condition.positionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by e.`name` ) a group by a.staff_name
